com.justai.zenbox.sdk

Class ZenboxService.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.justai.zenbox.sdk.ZenboxService.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    ZenboxService

    public static class ZenboxService.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    The Builder class contains methods to build a new instance of ZenboxService.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String apiKey, java.lang.String unitId)
      Creates a new instance of ZenboxService.Builder.

               java.lang.String apiKey,

        Creates a new instance of ZenboxService.Builder.
        Parameters:
        context - an application context
        apiKey - API key of your Zenbox project
        unitId - an unique unit ID of the device

      • setEarcon

        public ZenboxService.Builder setEarcon(int resId)
        Sets the earcon resource ID. The earcon is a sound to indicate the starting of speech-to-text process. ZenboxService will play it automatically if set.
        Parameters:
        resId - raw resource ID of earcon sound
        Returns:
        this object.

      • waitForEarcon

        public ZenboxService.Builder waitForEarcon()
        Configures ZenboxService to wait for earcon sound playback complete before starting the recognition. Otherwise playback and recognition start together and SpeechToText can eventually detect the start of speech if it doesn't support earcon.
        Returns:
        this object.

      • addSkill

        public ZenboxService.Builder addSkill(AbstractSkill skill)
        Adds an AbstractSkill implementation of some voice skill.
        Parameters:
        skill - the voice skill
        Returns:
        this object.

      • setEndpoint

        public ZenboxService.Builder setEndpoint(java.lang.String endpoint)
        Sets Zenbox API endpoint URL. This URL can differ from the standard sdk.zenbox.ai in cases of custom deployments or different regions.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the endpoint URL
        Returns:
        this object.

      • build

        public ZenboxService build()
        Builds the ZenboxService instance.
        Returns:
        ZenboxService instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if API key, unit ID or SpeechToText or TextToSpeech are not set
